topic:
Senior Python Backend Developer
    
    We are looking for an experienced Python developer to lead our backend team.
    
    Requirements:
    - 5+ years Python development
    - FastAPI or Django experience
    - PostgreSQL and Redis
    - Docker and Kubernetes
    
    Responsibilities:
    - Design and implement scalable backend systems
    - Lead technical discussions
    - Mentor junior developers
    - Deploy and maintain production systems
title: Senior Python Backend Developer

lines.text: (sarcastic) Uhh, let me be clear, Donald. (confused) Leading a backend team sounds like a total headache. Why bother?
(aggressive) Barack, you're low energy! (excited) This is a Senior Python role. Itâ€™s huge! They need a leader, a killer!
(confused) Python? Is that the snake? (sarcastic) I bet the tech is ancient and the pay is even worse.
(boastful) Wrong! It's FastAPI, Docker, and Kubernetes. (exultant) And the money? Tremendous. We're talking big salary, massive equity, the works!
(interested) Wait, equity and Kubernetes? (confident) So I get to mentor juniors and build scalable systems? That's actually sophisticated.
(excited) Exactly! You'll build an empire. (boastful) Stop overthinking and get the bag, Barack!
(confident) Alright, Donald. (satisfied) If we're talking production-grade systems and a massive bonus... I'm locked in.
